      • recursiveRecompile

        public static BBjVector recursiveRecompile(BBjString startPath$, BBjString backupdir$, BBjNumber fBackup, BBjNumber fRecursive)

        Recompiles the files starting at the given location

        Parameters:
        startPath$ The path of the file thats supposed to be the start of the recompiled batch
        backupdir$ The directiory where the backups are supposed to be saved
        fBackup A number indicating wether a backup is supposed to be created or not
        fRecursive A number indicating wether the compile should be recursive or not
        Returns:
        A BBjVector containing strings of the errors that happened
